name: Sewer Heroes
description:
In this minimalist solo roleplaying game game, you control a person/creature that lives in the sewers of a city and ventures there.

HIGHLIGHTS

  • Fast and simple character creation;
  • Simple mechanics that use 2 6-sided dice;
  • Tables to define quirks of your sewers, generate quests and scenes;
  • Word bank to help frame scenes, character backgrounds and any other narrative elements;
  • Oracle to answer your questions during gameplay.

WHAT DO YOU GET?

  • Eight-page version of the game, both in english and in brazilian portuguese.
